title: Manager \ Senior Business Analyst (Sales Analyst)
description:
Denave is hiring for "Business Analyst" role who has ability turn data into knowledge to deliver best possible solutions to our clients.




Skills Required : Client Management ,Team Management, Sales Reporting, Business Analytics, Sales Data Management ,Business Reporting




Job Responsibilities:

Translate business needs to technical specifications and then, Design, build and deploy BI solutions (e.g. reporting tools)
Familiarity with BI technologies (e.g. Tableau, Microsoft Power BI, Oracle BI)
Should have experience in managing sales processes as a business analyst
In-depth understanding of database management systems, online analytical processing (OLAP) and ETL (Extract, transform, load) framework
Perform hands-on analysis of large volumes of data and across multiple datasets primarily using SQL and/or Python/R.
Ability to identify actionable insights by analyzing data in respect to the business focus/needs.
Design models to solve business problems and, where appropriate, manage integration of the insights into regular reporting by the Reporting/BI teams
Use a range of analytical and statistical techniques to answer key questions from stakeholders
Must have experience of client handling roles, esp. requirement gathering and elicitation




What we expect from you:

B.Tech /BE/ BCA/ BSc in Computer Science, Engineering or relevant field, from reputed Engineering College/ Universities
5+ years of experience working as a Business Analyst and team management with hands on experience working on Sales Reports, Sales Analysis , Client Management is required
Familiarity with BI technologies (e.g. Tableau OR Microsoft Power BI OR Oracle BI)
Skills Required : Client Management , Sales Reporting ,Business Analytics, Data Modelling, Data Analytics, Data Modelling ,ETL (Informatica, Talend, Terradata, Jasper, etc. )
Total Experience : 5+Years
Relevant Experience : 2+Years (As a Business Analyst)
Good Communication and Analytical Skills
